main event: A UFO sighting report from Project Blue Book describes a colored object hovering over Brooklyn, New York for 15 minutes, possibly identified as a balloon.
interesting points: The report indicates that the sighting was of a colored object hovering over the location for 15 minutes.
It was a ground-visual observation with one observed object.
The document requests further evaluation with the witness' statement and suggests the possibility of the object being a balloon.
The report seeks an investigation in accordance with AFR 200-2 due to insufficient information for analysis and to form a valid conclusion.
There is a mention of coordination with military personnel and a request to investigate a telcon (telephone conversation) concerning a requested investigation of a white or lighted stationary object.
result: prozaic explanation e.g. "it was a balloon"
sighted object: a colored object hovering over Brooklyn, New York
